name: Freelancer Balancing
description: An eclectic mix of Freelancer balancing.

options.name: Assassin Nerf
options.tooltip: Make assassins not able to one-shot you at full health.

options.name: Bigger Booms
options.tooltip: Make explosives of all kinds have a larger radius of effect.

options.name: Mission Mod - Santa Fortuna
options.tooltip: Adds extra props and geometry for more cover from eyesight to Santa Fortuna town docks. Adds a new mission start point and exit point into the underground tunnels.

options.name: Mission Start - Dartmoor
options.tooltip: Adds a new possible starting point to Dartmoor next to the ruined church.

options.name: Mission Start - Sgail
options.tooltip: Adds a new possible starting point to the Isle of Sgail at a keep rampart overlooking the funeral mound.

options.name: Mission Exit - Marrakesh
options.tooltip: Adds a new Freelancer exit point in the market alley near the protest.

options.name: Mission Exit - Miami
options.tooltip: Adds a new Freelancer exit point to Miami at the pier outside the Kronstadt facility.

options.name: Throwable Bounce Nerf
options.tooltip: Make explosive/area-of-effect items bounce less.

options.name: Canister Buffs
options.tooltip: Make canisters carryable in your inventory. Water canister costs 1 less capacity. Slightly buffed spill effect range.

options.name: Colorful Weapon Replacements
options.tooltip: Replace some weapons with skinned variants.

options.name: Extra Epic Unsilenced Weapons
options.tooltip: Classicballer, the Striker, and HWK 21 white are now Epic weapons. Also Rude Ruby, Ornamental, and Concept 5 pistols, with stat enhancements (also to price).

options.name: Extra Stash Loot
options.tooltip: Some more items with rarity can be looted from stashes. Stashes are slightly more likely to have items with rarity.

options.name: Extra Supplier Items
options.tooltip: Suppliers sell some additional non-rarity items usually found in stashes like rusty tools and throwaway explosives. These items only last for the mission they are bought in. Fixes pistols not appearing in some situations.

options.name: Fishing More Productive
options.tooltip: Better chances to get the useful items from fishing.

options.name: Level Nerfs
options.tooltip: Makes some destinations have less guards, changes NPC routines, adds disguise pickups, and/or restores some removed-from-Freelancer items. Old Town Gate exit added to Sapienza.

options.name: Lust Explosive
options.tooltip: Replace the proximity ICA explosive device with the snake ring explosive from the sin of Lust - with enhanced explosive range.

options.name: Lust Blinding Dart Gun
options.tooltip: Buffs the Lust Dart Gun blind duration.

options.name: Miscellaneous - Item Tweaks
options.tooltip: Reduce Freelancer tool screwdriver capacity cost by 1. Reduce price of audio distractions and DLC pack consumables. Tripwire mine and 3 cost concussive explosive capacity cost reduced by 1. Tripwire mine counts as a Proximity Explosive for objectives.

options.name: Miscellaneous - Banker Pistol Piercing Version
options.tooltip: Turns Banker pistol into body piercing magnum with less accuracy and lower firerate, increased price, but remains suppressed.

english.1873169790: A classic, sleek black pistol with a silencer to match. High caliber for improved penetration and damage. For the assassin who knows that the bling is not everything.

options.name: Mercer Loot Buff
options.tooltip: Mercers you can pick up in levels are increased moderately in the amount of money they grant.

options.name: Easier Exits
options.tooltip: Some of the more tedious exits in maps do not require keys or disguises anymore. Includes Yates' car and shrine, Santa Fortuna boat and car, Haven diver exit and jetski, Marrakesh consulate car, Bangkok tuk-tuk, Whittleton construction, and New York CEO exit.

options.name: Non-target Kill Penalty Nerf
options.tooltip: Triples the non-target kill penalty.

options.name: Objectives - SMG Guard Kill
options.tooltip: SMG Guard Kills is no longer a generic Syndicate objective, but is instead limited to more appropriate Syndicates.

options.name: Objectives - Payout Changes
options.tooltip: All objective payouts rebalanced to reward difficulty and potential time spent on completing objective better.

options.name: Objectives - No Extra Objectives
options.tooltip: Do not add extra Syndicate objectives.

options.name: Objectives - More Generic Objectives
options.tooltip: Adds more generic objectives possible for all Syndicates. Included are explosion (remote, prox, generic) kills, accident kill, blind target, and fiberwire kill.

options.name: Objectives - More Generic Objectives (No Explosives)
options.tooltip: Adds more generic objectives possible for all Syndicates. Included are accident kill, blind target, and fiberwire kill.

options.name: Disguises - Extra Suit Disguise Functionality
options.tooltip: Add extra disguise functionality to certain suits. Be wary of unexpected enforcers at mission start. Sniper Challenge Suit: New York Investment Banker, The Drop LED Suit: Berlin DJ, Freelancer Mastery Suit: Colorado Hacker, Arkian Tuxedo: Ark Sentinel with weapons allowed, Tropical Suit: Marrakesh Printer + Basic Soldier, Lucky Ducky Hoodie: Paris Stylist, Midnight Suit: Colombia Mansion Guard no weapons, Raver Suit: Bangkok Record Crew, Tactical Turtleneck: Ambrose Militia and Sapienza Biolab Guard no weapons, Ancestral Hunter + Formal Hunting: Outside access Dartmoor, Splitter Suit + Flashy Sins Suits: Bollywood Tower Guard no weapons.

options.name: Disguises - Extra Modded Suit Disguise Functionality
options.tooltip: Add extra disguise functionality to mod provided replacement suits. Said mods required to run with this option. 'Refined Tactical' by Bryn from Tidy Suits mod: Sapienza Mansion Guard with weapons

options.name: Placing Items Buff
options.tooltip: Should increase item placement range. Place items in Safehouse.

options.name: Safehouse Reward Chest Nerf
options.tooltip: Nerfs the possible items from the Showdown completion reward crate. This means Legendary and Epic items as rewards are much rarer and not guaranteed.

options.name: Slippery Items Buff
options.tooltip: Bananas and grape vines should have slightly larger slip areas when placed.

options.name: Shotgun Buff
options.tooltip: HV shotguns (except Ornamental) can be holstered. Capacity values changed. Supplier prices raised.

options.name: SMG Buff
options.tooltip: TAC (except Ornamental) and Raptor SMGs can be holstered. Capacity values changed. Supplier prices raised accordingly.

options.name: Tazer Buffs
options.tooltip: All tazers cost 1 less capacity.

options.name: Scope Laser Removal
options.tooltip: Remove scope laser from the Leviathan.
